name: TetanusDiphtheriaPertusisTdapVaccineAllergyIntolerance
title: Tetanus, Diphtheria, Pertusis (Tdap) Vaccine Allergy Intolerance
purpose: (Clinical Focus: SNOMED CT codes and RxNORM codes that could be returned by the FHIR Allergy Intolerance resource, and would indicate allergy or intolerance to Tdap vaccines),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE:Tdap vaccines),(Inclusion Criteria: RxNORM codes for individual medications that are Tdap vaccines, and various SNOMED CT codes that would indicate allergy or intolerance to Tdap vaccines as a class, or individual Tdap vaccine),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
